website_summaries.verdict: A deluxe scuba diving vest that's super-stretchy and provides a snug, comfortable fit.
pros: Includes flatlock seams for increased comfort and durability
Designed to insulate your body and help you maintain your core temperature
Boasts a heavy-duty front zipper and Lycra-trimmed openings
cons: May be too small for some users
No clips or loops, which can make it tough to maintain a comfortable fit at all times

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vest a short time, but so far, it has met my expectations. Although I am a woman, I ordered a men's size because it had all the features I was looking for. It keeps me warm in a cold outdoor pool while I do water aerobics. I like the vest, as it allows free arm movement. Only complaint is that it rides up a bit-wish it were just a bit longer. Looking forward to trying it out in the ocean as soon as it warms up a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Vest
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this "wetsuit" vest for walking in the morning. I need to keep my back warm on these freezing mornings. By using this simple vest under my down parka I can keep my body's core warm just by walking. And since those morning walks are important for my health and something that my dog insists on, keeping warn is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any Hawaii snorkel trip
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my trip to Maui. We went on several snorkel trips where people were renting them and I was so glad to have my own. It was so comfortable I wore it for the whole week at every snorkel spot. I wear a medium/large t-shirt and ordered a large and it fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product that I use for swimming in the ocean ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product that I use for swimming in the ocean or in the pool in the winter. I am open my second one in 2 years as I swim almost daily from 3 to 5 miles weekly.
customer_reviews.author: RDP

customer_reviews.title: Sizing charts are undersized. They were too lazy to even put one here - you get it on the item tag.
customer_reviews.text: Sizing charts are undersized. They were too lazy to even put one here - you get it on the item tag.
customer_reviews.author: uzevla

customer_reviews.title: I use this vest by itself and sometimes over my ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this vest by itself and sometimes over my wet suit to block the wind. The sizing is smaller than my normal size so go up at least 1 size . I returned mine twice too get on that fit properly .
customer_reviews.author: G  D

customer_reviews.title: the best swim vest on the market
customer_reviews.text: It zips-up high, well made, and it keeps you warm either to swim, or add to a wetsuit on a cold dive. Superb!
customer_reviews.author: Waikiki

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: Was a great fitting vest and kept my husband warm during our dives in the Caribbean.
customer_reviews.author: Caymandiver

customer_reviews.title: arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: worked great snorkeling in the cayman islands,didnt need the thermal protection but did stop the "back burn" while snorkeling,worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: KEN

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove ... Very nice .. Had many compliments ...
customer_reviews.author: Mark in PA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for swimming in cold water off Cape Cod.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Jules

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made vest
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made vest. I realize they are supposed to be snug but I had to order at least a full size over what I normally wear. Now it fits snug but not heart stopping tight. So, other than size the vest is great and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

product_meta.title: NeoSport Men's 2.5-mm XSPAN Vest (Men's Black/Blue)
product_meta.description: The NeoSport 2.5mm XSPAN Vest is a very versatile piece; it can be worn boating, kayaking, jettskiing, wakeboarding, snorkeling or just about any other water sport you can think of. Made from our exclusive XSPAN 250-Percent 4-way super stretch material allows for a nice comfortable fit.
feature_bullets: Should fit snug, but not too tight
Designed to fit snugly, the XSPAN sport vest insulates your body and helps maintain core temperature
Flatlock seams for comfort and durability
Heavy duty #10 YKK front zipper, Lycra-trimmed openings
